summary: Young Ondra has asthma and so his mom throws away his favorite toy: a musty old stuffed bear named Kooky. That night Ondra dreams that Kooky is determined to find his way back home from the... See full summary »
cast: Zdenek Sverák|Ondrej Sverák|Jirí Machácek|Petr Ctvrtnícek|Jirí Lábus|Ondrej Vetchý|Jirí Schmitzer|Václav Postránecký|Miroslav Táborský|Pavel Liska|Kristýna Nováková|Filip Capka|Oldrich Kaiser|Vasil Fridrich|Helena Hrubantová|Michal Slaný|Eva Lamesová|Tomás Racek|Milan Crha|Barbora Steuerová|Petr Forman
title: Kuky se vrací
